decks.notes: This Grixis Control deck focuses on disrupting opponents' plans through various forms of removal and counterspells, while also generating card advantage with card draw effects and efficient threats. The deck aims to control the game by answering threats and manipulating the opponent's hand, while setting up for powerful plays with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Tyrant's Scorn. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers and versatile answers allows the deck to adapt to a wide range of threats and strategies, ultimately overwhelming opponents with a combination of disruption and resilience.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the Cephalid Breakfast combo by using Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill your library, triggering Narcomoeba to bring back Dread Return to reanimate Thassa's Oracle for the win. The deck also includes various control elements like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to protect the combo. Urza's Saga provides additional utility by tutoring for key pieces like Shuko. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps with card filtering and selection to find the combo pieces faster.

The deck focuses on using the Doomsday combo to manipulate the top of the deck and win the game with Thassa's Oracle. It utilizes cards like Dark Ritual, Lion's Eye Diamond, and Lotus Petal to generate mana quickly and cast Doomsday early. Veil of Summer and Force of Will protect the combo, while Tamiyo, Teferi, and Daze help control the game. The deck aims to set up a winning Doomsday pile while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells and card draw, ultimately winning the game in a single turn.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a huge advantage. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Daze to protect the combo and control the opponent's plays. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty while using Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student for card advantage. The strategy is to outpace and outvalue the opponent through efficient combos and strong creature reanimation.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Cascade mechanic to quickly cast powerful spells like Crashing Footfalls and Violent Outburst. By using cards like Shardless Agent and Lórien Revealed, the deck aims to consistently cascade into these high-impact spells while disrupting opponents with counters like Force of Will and Force of Negation. The deck also includes versatile spells like Fire / Ice and Brazen Borrower for additional flexibility. With a mix of mana acceleration from Elvish Spirit Guide and Simian Spirit Guide, along with land disruption from Wasteland, this deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays to overwhelm opponents.

The main focus of this Legacy Merfolk deck is to quickly build a board presence with aggressive Merfolk creatures such as Lord of Atlantis, Mindspring Merfolk, and Tide Shaper. This deck also includes control elements like Sink into Stupor and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's strategy. With the help of cards like Mistcaller and Vodalian Hexcatcher, the Merfolk tribe is strengthened and supported. Additionally, the inclusion of True-Name Nemesis provides a resilient threat that is difficult for opponents to deal with effectively. Using Cavern of Souls ensures that Merfolk spells can't be countered, allowing for a more consistent game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to quickly bring powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier onto the battlefield. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo and control the opponent's plays. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures while disrupting their game plan with counterspells and hand disruption. It also includes card draw and tutor effects to help find the necessary combo pieces efficiently.

This Combo - Reanimator deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck utilizes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Daze to protect its combo pieces, while also controlling the board with cards like Wasteland and Brazen Borrower. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and filtering, while Murktide Regent adds a powerful threat to the board. Overall, the deck aims to quickly reanimate powerful creatures and overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying powerful Eldrazi creatures while disrupting the opponent with cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Chalice of the Void. By utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb, the deck can deploy threats ahead of schedule and overwhelm the opponent. Wasteland and Wastescape Battlemage provide additional disruption by targeting the opponent's lands. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control of the game by utilizing efficient Eldrazi creatures and disruptive spells.

The deck focuses on quickly applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Questing Druid and Murktide Regent, while utilizing disruptive spells like Daze and Force of Will to control the game. It also combines synergies with cards like Brainstorm and Mishra's Bauble to maintain card advantage and filter through the deck efficiently. The use of Wasteland and powerful removal like Lightning Bolt allows the deck to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a fast pace to quickly close out games. The deck aims to consistently apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's strategy to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a fast and aggressive tempo. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Fatal Push, the deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's hand. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps generate card advantage and provides additional disruption. The creatures in the deck, such as Barrowgoyf and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, serve as aggressive threats to quickly close out the game. Utilizing a mix of aggro and control elements, this Dimir Tempo deck aims to control the pace of the game and secure a victory.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana using Cloudpost and Ancient Tomb to play powerful spells and threats like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Eye of the Storm. It also includes disruptive elements like Chalice of the Void and Force of Will to control the game and protect its combo pieces. The key strategy is to generate massive amounts of mana early on to overwhelm the opponent and win the game quickly with high impact cards like Planar Nexus and Thundertrap Trainer.

The deck focuses on disruptive creatures that can slow down the opponent while also providing aggressive threats. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares for disruption, Aether Vial for mana efficiency, and Stoneforge Mystic to search for powerful equipment. The deck also includes cards like Skyclave Apparition and Containment Priest to deal with threats from the opponent. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value with the deck's flicker effects, providing a versatile and adaptable game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board by utilizing lands and spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. By utilizing cards like Crop Rotation and Wasteland to interact with the opponent's lands, while also using Life from the Loam to recur key lands and spells, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent over the long game. Additionally, the deck can use powerful threats like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Overlord of the Balemurk to close out the game once it has established control of the board.

The deck focuses on using artifacts to generate mana and combo off with Mystic Forge to cast multiple spells in a turn, potentially leading to a game-winning play. It utilizes cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain to support the combo pieces and control the board. The presence of powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Glaring Fleshraker add additional win conditions and disruption to the strategy. The land base is designed to support the artifact-heavy deck with cards like Urza's Workshop and Ancient Tomb for fast mana production.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield to gain a significant advantage over the opponent. It also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to control the opponent's plays while building up its own board presence. The deck aims to combo out by reanimating creatures like Archon of Cruelty or Atraxa, Grand Unifier to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.
